name: The Exorcist: Legion VR - Complete Series
name_original: The Exorcist: Legion VR - Complete Series
description:
In The Exorcist: Legion VR Complete Series you will face a variety of supernatural entities as your journey begins in Boston and ends in one of the darkest, most forgotten places imaginable. This collection includes 'Chapter 1: First Rites', 'Chapter 2: Idle Hands', 'Chapter 3: Skin Deep', 'Chapter 4: Samaritan' and 'Chapter 5: The Tomb'.

1 player
150MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Offline Play Enabled
PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
